text: Aphelandra sulphurea is a species of plant in the family Acanthaceae. It is endemic to Ecuador. Its natural habitat is subtropical or tropical moist lowland forests. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==References== sulphurea Category:Endemic flora of Ecuador Category:Near threatened plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot Category:Taxa named by Joseph Dalton Hooker
title: Aphelandra sulphurea
